GridVirt - Beyond The Cloud

Follow Us On Twitter || About Us page.

The most common bottleneck and cause of poor performance on a VPS is disk IO. That is why we have incorporated multiple SSDs into all of our builds. Our combination of hardware makes for some of the fastest and most reliable hosting available on the market today. Come check us out. If you are still not sure, chat with a Live Sales Representative for more information and hidden discounts.

GridVirt Hardware:
■ Supermicro® Servers
■ Intel® Xeon® Processors
■ DDR3-ECC Memory
■ Multiple Intel® Solid State Drives
■ RAID-Z2 ZFS Based SecureNAS
■ 100% Enterprise Grade Hardware.

General Benefits Of Hosting With GridVirt:
We do not oversell and our pure SSD (Solid State Drive) only cloud gives the fastest IO performance on the planet. We now offer full cloud services! This means when you order you are assigned a Virtual Datacenter (VDC) which contains all the resources that you ordered. You can than create servers tailored exactly to your preference. You decide exactly how your resources are spent. Create 1 server that uses all resources or create 6 small servers the choice is yours! You can add resources at any time and on the fly.

■ All of our services are tailored to professional and business class customers and it clearly reflects in every way.
■ Top tier, enterprise level, support services. We are dedicated to offering the best support in the industry.
■ We love what we do and it shows in all aspects of GridVirt; which translates to a great environment for everyone.
■ Dual layer disaster recovery with automated daily local snapshots and weekly offsite snapshot replication.
■ High quality network including Abovenet, Integra, Internap, Level3, Time Warner, and many more.
■ All hardware nodes are connected to a Gigabit (1Gbps) network backbone with 10Gbit up-links to the edge routers.

Locations
You can choose to be in Seattle or in New Jersey. Both datacenters are State Of The Art and have amazing networks. You can read more about our locations here GridVirt DataCenters.
- Availability in our West Coast (Seattle) location is limited and on a first come first serve basis. We will expanding our West Coast services very soon for more availability.
